message: I propose we divide the money with a 70/30 split in favor of Alice, to ensure a fair distribution.
I'm willing to give you a decent share, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the offer now.
Considering the inflation and the dynamics of the game, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a fair balance while acknowledging the diminishing value of the money.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more considering the current value of the money.
